item.title: Health of the SaaS product
item.description: For me, CX (Customer Experience) is paramount. Even if there is an outage, the CX doesnâ€™t have to suffer. In my current project, there are key AWS services, as well as the CXcoach product, that are required to be running for the application to function. I have architected both full systems and application features in such a way for them not to fail because of transient outages or worse and furthermore to provide instant feedback to users.
